globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://raw.githubusercontent.com https://assets.pokemon.com; connect-src 'self' https://beta.pokeapi.co; frame-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self';
